settings.description: Maximize Your Savings by Joining Our Membership Community.

Become a part of the exclusive Peak Performers Club at Shine and elevate your snow sport adventures! Our membership is designed for enthusiasts who crave the thrill of the slopes and the camaraderie of fellow snow lovers. As a member, you'll enjoy early access to our newest gear, exclusive discounts on products and services, and invites to members-only events and workshops. Whether you're a seasoned skier or a snowboarding novice, the Peak Performers Club is your gateway to making every winter unforgettable. Join today and start enjoying the benefits right away!

As a valued member of the Peak Performers Club, your journey to the summit is packed with unparalleled benefits. The Summit Series Benefits include complimentary tune-ups for your equipment, a personal shopping assistant to help you choose the right gear, and priority booking for our highly sought-after ski and snowboarding classes. Additionally, enjoy an annual exclusive retreat to a top-rated ski resort, where you can test your skills and relax in luxury.
